title: Lockdown needs to be extended by two more weeks to witness positive results: DG Health
snippet: Director General of Health Services Dr. Asela Gunawardane said yesterday the current lockdown would have to be extended by at least two more weeks to witness the outcome of the current travel restrictions.

title: Sri Lanka Cricket Aims At Launching Women's T20 League In October
snippet: The Sri Lanka Cricket(SLC) is likely to launch Lanka's women's T20 cricket league in October month this year and the tournament is said to take place with four teams. Sri Lankan cricket hasn't been showing a lot of progress in recent years and this is going to take them to a greater height for sure.

title: Sri Lanka Cricket to launch Lanka Women's T20 League in October
snippet: Sri Lanka Cricket (SLC) is planning to launch a Lanka Women's League T20 cricket league in October and are in search of a suitable sports/marketing agency to join hands with them.

title: Kabul Airlift:They made it possible
snippet: It looked like a zombie apocalypse. About to make the final U.S. takeoffs out of Afghanistan, U.S. military pilots and air crew saw a sky lit up with fireworks and sporadic gunfire and an airfield littered with the battered shells of planes and destroyed equipment.

title: Government borrowings from banking sector, including CB surge in July
